metadata.name: Kiss Kiss Blam Blam
metadata.description: Jill is a very busy business woman in her thirties...you know, that lady who's always on the phone and asks her coffee to-go? Who is so successful at her job but a total failure when it comes to love? Jill doesn't have time for a proper date, but she's decided to try this new thing called speed dating. Will she find her Prince Charming? Or are some things too good to be true? Find out in this candy-colored page-turner!
